sentences.sContent: The dirty-faced waif was only five or six years old.
sentences.sCn: 这个流浪儿脸上脏兮兮的，只有五六岁大。

synos.tran: 流浪者；流浪儿；飘流物；无主物；[水运]信号旗

phrases.pCn: n. 零碎东西；无家可归的人；流浪的动物

remMethod.val: 家就是有一扇门在等 (wait) 你， 使你不再是流浪者 → 流浪者

trans.tranCn: 流浪者；流浪儿；飘流物；无主物；信号旗
trans.tranOther: If you refer to a child or young woman as a waif, you mean that they are very thin and look as if they have nowhere to live
